items.name: Marko Marlee
items.text: We partnered with Agile Job Solution for a large-scale hiring initiative and were thoroughly impressed by their efficiency and expertise. items.text: As a multinational corporation, finding a staffing partner that can effectively coordinate talent needs across different countries was challenging. They are our go-to for international staffing solutions
